item.title: NFL Ratings via MLE
item.description: Rating NFL Teams - Wayne Winston’s method In Wayne Winston’s book Mathletics he devotes a chapter to “Rating Sports Teams.” This technique is also covered in a couple of his other wonderful excel books. The technique is covered (less thorougly) in an older article avaiable on the Office site, titled “Using Solver to Rate Sports Teams”. Let’s implement a very simple version of this in R. I’m not an optimization expert.

item.title: Home Field Advantage in the NFL
item.description: Calculating HFA for NFL the Easy Way We are going to come up with a number for home field advantage (pretend we don’t already know that 3 points is a pretty solid estimate). Since we only need team, score, and location we could use just about any dataset. For NFL data it’s hard to beat ArmchairAnalysis for quality and price. The GAME.csv file contains all the information we’re looking for (which isn’t much more than team scores).
